Sentencas: Crystallographic features, physical properties and ionic release from yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) in suspension were studied by means of XRD, TEM, light-scattering particle size, BET, ICP and zeta potential analysis.
Titulo: Effects of washing and calcination-milling on ionic release and surface properties of yttria stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: It was found that Zr, Y, Na, and to a lesser extent Ca, Hf and Pd leach from 8 mol% YSZ powder.
Titulo: Effects of washing and calcination-milling on ionic release and surface properties of yttria stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The impurities present increase the zeta potential of suspensions made from as-received YSZ.
Titulo: Effects of washing and calcination-milling on ionic release and surface properties of yttria stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: A trace amount of tetragonal phase observed in 8 mol% YSZ persists following washing and calcination milling.
Titulo: Effects of washing and calcination-milling on ionic release and surface properties of yttria stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: Dislocations and crystallographic defects together with fractured crystals which form during milling of the calcined powder should lead to the formation of more broken bonds; as a result the surface of the particles can support higher surface charge density.
Titulo: Effects of washing and calcination-milling on ionic release and surface properties of yttria stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: Washing and calcination milling lead to a shift of the isoelectric point of 8 mol% YSZ from pH 8.4 to pH 6.3 and 6.8, respectively.
Titulo: Effects of washing and calcination-milling on ionic release and surface properties of yttria stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: Due to higher chemical stability and previously shown positive impacts on microstructure and performance of fuel cells, use of calcined YSZ can be more advantageous than as received powder.
Titulo: Effects of washing and calcination-milling on ionic release and surface properties of yttria stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: (c) 2016 Elsevier Ltd and Techna Group S.r.l.
Titulo: Effects of washing and calcination-milling on ionic release and surface properties of yttria stabilized zirconia
Effects of washing and calcination-milling on ionic release and surface properties of yttria stabilized zirconia
